text: Reto Knutti (born 1973) is a Swiss climate scientist and professor of climate physics at ETH Zurich's Institute for Atmospheric and Climate Science. He is known for his research involving climate models, and has been a key member of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change. ==References== ==External links== *Faculty page * Category:Climatologists Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:ETH Zurich faculty Category:Swiss physicists Category:Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change lead authors
title: Reto Knutti
